data.name: AMID EVIL Demo
data.detailed_description: It's a demo for AMID EVIL!
data.about_the_game: It's a demo for AMID EVIL!
data.short_description: It's a demo for AMID EVIL!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.5 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GTX or AMD Radeon RX 580 series card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
